msbt.message: A paper text for :
, you're fab!
To the AWESOME !
Guess what, ?
To my bestie, !
You ever wonder if you can have too much glitter? Me neither.
I imagined your letter was fan mail, and it made me so happy I tingled!
You're so good at writing letters. My letters are all over the place!
The letter you sent me the other day was legit fantastico!
I read your note a BUNCH of times! Très sweet stuff! So...heartfelt!
Apropos of nothing, what are your thoughts on the glammest fish in the sea? I've got to know!
So, what am I up to... Oh! I learned glitter glue is a lousy hair product. Obvs, yes, but it was for science!
B-T-dubs, I'm writing a sad song! I'm shooting for a song that'll make folks cry. (On purpose, I mean.)
I meant to ask! I had a dream about you saying "Dwilp le blap," and I want you to tell me what it means!
While I've got you here, I want to ask if you know anyone who wants my autograph. I have my own pen!
Well, time to go to dance practice!
I wrote this while covered in glitter.
I'm off to be me as loud as I can!
OK, time to sign off!
I'll see you around!
Your trendsetter,
Your fave celeb,
–: Future Pop Star
Your bestie,
Fashionably early,
